contents.name: Our Doctors

contents.title: Welcome to City Hospital
contents.fulltext: City Hospital Limited Dhaka  is the newest hospital one of the largest Bangladeshi health care  provider. The hospital is a 150 beds and tertiary care facility,  delivering international standard health care at an affordable price to  the peoples of Bangladesh.
contents.name: Welcome to City Hospital

contents.title: About Us
contents.fulltext:
City Hospital Limited
Get a world class Health service

City Hospital Ltd started on 19-02-1999 as 20 bed Specialized Burn & Plastic Surgery Hospital at 69/I/1, Panthapath, Dhanmondi, Dhaka-1205, then shifted to Lalmatia, Dhaka from 15th July, 2006 as 100 beded general hospital including 24 bed Burn & Plastic Surgery (8 High Dependency Unit beds and 16 general beds). Presently we have different specialties like Medicine, Diabetes & Endocrinology, Gynaecology & Obstetrics, Neo-natology & Paediatric, Nephrology, Urology, ENT, Gastroenterology, General and Laparoscopic surgery, Oncology,Haemato-oncology, Neuro-medicine, Orthopaedic, Spine & Arthroscopic Surgery, Dermatology, Dental Surgery & Dental Implant and Physiotherapy. This hospital also...
contents.name: About Us

contents.title: Emergency & Primary Care Unit
contents.fulltext:
City Hospital Ltd.  has  a well establish and fully equipped emergency department. This  department is providing 24 hours emergency care to the patients. All  type of emergencies are dealt here with highest care. ICU personal are  supporting this emergency department round the clock.  We  have full time medical officer under supervision of consultant who is  available by shifting duties. We have the following facilities:

Trained and skilled medical officers to take care all the time. 
Trained and skilled nursing facilities. 
Highly equipped
Oxygen therapy, nebulization and argent ECG facility available.
Laboratory investigations available within short time....
contents.name: Emergency & Primary Care Unit

contents.title: Medicine & Diabetes unit
contents.fulltext:
Diseases   are growing day by day. People are worried about the emergency medical   care. City Hospital Ltd. glad to inform you to provide unparallel,   quality medical service to the people of Bangladesh.  We have a  full-fledged medicine unit which is giving medical services  round the  clock. We have full time medicine consultant who is available  round the  clock. We are providing specialist medical care to inpatient  and  outpatient with the help of medicine consultant. We have the  following  facilities: 

Treatment  of ...
contents.name: Medicine & Diabetes unit

contents.title: Gynae & Obstetrics Unit
contents.fulltext:
City  Hospital Ltd. is a multi-disciplinary well equipped hospital . We have a  modernized well equipped gynaecology and obstetrics unit. We provide  full time consultant of gynae and obstetrics. Huge investment has been  done to equip this unit. We have the following facilities:    

Full time consultant who is available round the clock. 
 Highly trained and skilled medical officer  who take care of gynae & obstetrics patients. 
 Gyanecology & obstetrical emergencies such as ICU care, emergency caesarian section. 
All types of  O.T facilities
 CTG machine to see fetal heart rate monitoring.   

We have...
contents.name: Gynae & Obstetrics Unit

contents.title: Newborn & Paediatric care Unit
contents.fulltext:
City Hospital Ltd.  has  a well established & highly equipped paediatric & Neonatal  Intensive Care unit. This unit is providing best service to the  paediatric patients round the clock. We have  paediatric consultant to take care of these patients. We have the following available round the clock.  We have following facilities :

Well equipped
Emergency services such as incubator.  
Phototherapy 
Ventilator
Highly trained & skilled medical officers. 
Trained nursing staff.
contents.name: Newborn & Paediatric care Unit

contents.title: General & Laparoscopic Surgery
contents.fulltext:
City Hospital Ltd.  has  well established and highly equipped general and laparoscopic surgery  unit. This unit is providing a quality service to patients. Surgeries  are done here as follows:  

Removal of different tumours
Treatment of chronic ulcer,
 GIT surgery
 Breast surgery
Thyroid surgery
 Laparoscopic cholecystectomy  etc.
contents.name: General & Laparoscopic Surgery
